trans-unit.source: Specifies or receives the attributes of a list-view item

trans-unit.source: Set of flags that specify which members of this structure contain data to be set or which members are being requested. This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

seg-source.mrk: Set of flags that specify which members of this structure contain data to be set or which members are being requested.
This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

target.mrk: Set of flags that specify which members of this structure contain data to be set or which members are being requested.
This member can have one or more of the following flags set:

trans-unit.source: $LVIF_COLFMT - The piColFmt member is valid or must be set. If this flag is used, the cColumns member is valid or must be set Windows Vista or later.

seg-source.mrk: $LVIF_COLFMT - The piColFmt member is valid or must be set.
If this flag is used, the cColumns member is valid or must be set Windows Vista or later.

target.mrk: $LVIF_COLFMT - The piColFmt member is valid or must be set.
If this flag is used, the cColumns member is valid or must be set Windows Vista or later.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an array of the following flags (alone or in combination, specifying the format of each subitem in extended tile view (Windows 7 and later).

seg-source.mrk: A pointer to an array of the following flags (alone or in combination, specifying the format of each subitem in extended tile view (Windows 7 and later).

target.mrk: A pointer to an array of the following flags (alone or in combination, specifying the format of each subitem in extended tile view (Windows 7 and later).

trans-unit.source: Value Meaning:

seg-source.mrk: Value Meaning:

target.mrk: Value Meaning:

trans-unit.source: $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK - Forces the column to wrap to the top of the next list of columns.

seg-source.mrk: $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK - Forces the column to wrap to the top of the next list of columns.

target.mrk: $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK - Forces the column to wrap to the top of the next list of columns.

trans-unit.source: $LVCFMT_FILL Fills - the remainder of the tile area. Might have a title.

seg-source.mrk: $LVCFMT_FILL Fills - the remainder of the tile area.
Might have a title.

target.mrk: $LVCFMT_FILL Fills - the remainder of the tile area.
Might have a title.

trans-unit.source: $LVCFMT_WRAP - Allows the column to wrap within the remaining space in its list of columns.

seg-source.mrk: $LVCFMT_WRAP - Allows the column to wrap within the remaining space in its list of columns.

target.mrk: $LVCFMT_WRAP - Allows the column to wrap within the remaining space in its list of columns.

trans-unit.source: $LVCFMT_NO_TITLE - Removes the title from the subitem.

seg-source.mrk: $LVCFMT_NO_TITLE - Removes the title from the subitem.

target.mrk: $LVCFMT_NO_TITLE - Removes the title from the subitem.

trans-unit.source: $LVCFMT_TILE_PLACEMENTMASK - Equivalent to a combination of $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK and $LVCFMT_FILL.

seg-source.mrk: $LVCFMT_TILE_PLACEMENTMASK - Equivalent to a combination of $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK and $LVCFMT_FILL.

target.mrk: $LVCFMT_TILE_PLACEMENTMASK - Equivalent to a combination of $LVCFMT_LINE_BREAK and $LVCFMT_FILL.

trans-unit.source: Group index of the item. Valid only for owner data/callback (single item in multiple groups) (Windows Vista or later).

seg-source.mrk: Group index of the item.
Valid only for owner data/callback (single item in multiple groups) (Windows Vista or later).

target.mrk: Group index of the item.
Valid only for owner data/callback (single item in multiple groups) (Windows Vista or later).
